content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

High times are ahead on 90210.

The awfully-acted CW drama has booked the Snoopiest of all Doggs to make a cameo on an upcoming episode, as TV Line confirms our favorite actor/rapper will appear as himself on a spring installment.

He’ll even bring daughter Cori along for the guest-starring stint.

Look for Snoop to run into Tristan Wilds’ Dixon at a car wash, as the West Beverly student will both freak out and attempt to impress his hip hop idol.

What else can fans of this series expect in 2011? Our friends at TV Fanatic have the answer in their 90210 spoilers section!
